column1: * 1918 - J.R.R. Tolkien is readmitted to Brooklands Officers Hospital
* 1981 - The nineteenth episode of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.

column2: scholar and friend of J.R.R. Tolkien

column1: * 2005 - Der Berggeist is auctioned at Sothebys.
